name: OHB
goal: OHB offers solutions addressing the entire value chain for satellite development, manufacturing and operation, data transmission and processing and the development and manufacturing of scientific payloads and aerospace/aviation structures.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
- European Space Policy in general
- European GNSS (Galileo)
- Copernicus
- Horizon 2020
- Horizon Europe
- EU Space Strategy
